metadata.synopsis: Short phrase that the flaming fist thief says when he runs out of Barracks.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A goto -5; 44; 199Approach / click on the flaming fist thiefWake up the guards - the thief will start running away and say this phrase.

0.speaker: Fist Reynash
0.text: Why'd you have to stick your nose in?!
